org.apromore.plugin.deployment

Interface DeploymentPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugin, PropertyAwarePlugin
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDeploymentPlugin

    public interface DeploymentPlugin
extends PropertyAwarePlugin
    Interface for Deployment Plugins, that support deploying processes to a process/work-flow engine.
    Author:
    Felix Mannhardt

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Deploys the process in canonical process format to a process/work-flow engine.

      Deploys the process in canonical process format to a process/work-flow engine.

        getAvailableProperties, getMandatoryProperties, getOptionalProperties

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apromore.plugin.Plugin

    • Method Detail

      • getNativeType

        String getNativeType()
        Native type the Deployment Plugin uses
        Returns:
        native type the process will be deployed to

      • deployProcess

        PluginResult deployProcess(org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType canonicalProcess,
                         PluginRequest request)
                           throws DeploymentException,
                                  PluginException
        Deploys the process in canonical process format to a process/work-flow engine.
        Parameters:
        canonicalProcess - the process to be deployed
        Throws:
        DeploymentException - in case of an error during deployment
        PluginException - in case of an error related to Plugins

      • deployProcess

        PluginResult deployProcess(org.apromore.cpf.CanonicalProcessType canonicalProcess,
                         org.apromore.anf.AnnotationsType annotation,
                         PluginRequest request)
                           throws DeploymentException,
                                  PluginException
        Deploys the process in canonical process format to a process/work-flow engine.
        Parameters:
        canonicalProcess - the process to be deployed
        annotation - to be used during deployment
        Throws:
        DeploymentException - in case of an error during deployment
        PluginException - in case of an error related to Plugins
